text: This 22- storied state of the art building will be completed by 2020.Construction work on the OPD of the National Hospital with the funds of Chinese government commenced yesterday (8th Aug.) with the participation of Health Minister Dr. Rajitha Senaratne and Chinese Ambassador Yi Xianliang. This 22- storied state of the art building will be completed by 2020.
title: New OPD building for National Hospital
